summary: A midnight showing of an early 1970's horror movie turns to chaos when the Killer from the movie comes out of the film to attack those in the theater.
cast: Rebekah Brandes|Daniel Bonjour|Greg Cirulnick|Stan Ellsworth|Mandell Maughan|Melissa Steach|Justin Baric|Jon Briddell|Michael Swan|Michael Schwartz|Brea Grant|Shaun Ausmus|Carol Stanzione|Lee Main|Ashley Black|Jim Mahoney|Kathryn Aagesen|Dinora Walcott|Arthur Roberts|Christopher Page|Michael Gleissner|Henry Watkins|Aaron Massey|Sean Matic|Christian Badami|Patrick Viall|Richard Magarey|Laury Prudent|Bebe Pham|Jazmine Valte|Roy Samuelson|Linda Sunshine|Joe Taborek|Dan Petrando|Valiant Michael|Christopher Michael Casey|Tiffany Pulvino
title: Midnight Movie
